name: Mango Shake
history: Mango Shake is a popular beverage enjoyed worldwide, particularly in regions where mangoes are a native fruit. This refreshing drink is made by blending ripe mangoes with milk and sugar, and it's often enjoyed in the summer months.
description: Mango Shake is a creamy and delightful drink made from ripe mangoes, milk, and sugar, blended to a smooth consistency. It's a sweet and refreshing beverage, perfect for hot days or as a nutritious snack.

instructions.title: Blend Ingredients
instructions.description: In a blender, combine the chopped mangoes, milk, and sugar. Blend until smooth and creamy. Add ice cubes if desired for a chilled drink.

instructions.title: Serve
instructions.description: Pour the mango shake into glasses. Garnish with chopped mango or mint leaves. Serve immediately.

tips: Use ripe and sweet mangoes for the best flavor.
Adjust the amount of sugar based on the sweetness of the mangoes.
variations: Add a scoop of vanilla ice cream for a richer shake.
Blend in a few cardamom pods for a unique flavor.

storage.instructions: Mango shake does not store well as it tends to separate.

presentationTips: Serve in tall glasses with a straw.
Garnish with a slice of mango on the rim of the glass for an attractive look.
